body:
@ClmnsRck The`libelf` download is broken.  Try manually downloading from here to see that:
https://directory.fsf.org/wiki/Libelf

The solution in these cases is usually to find the same tarball from a well-known Linux distro source, and change the package.py file to use it.  As long as the checksum is the same, it's all OK.

Maybe try slackware:
http://ftp.slackware.com/pub/gsb/gsb64-2.30_slackware64-13.1/source/l/libelf/
title: libelf download broken
